title: 18: S5E18 – "Lurking in the Lore" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Jacob Senstad, Jon Thomas, Kyle Harrison, and Christine Morgan, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about aquatic atrocities, sinister sounds, lurid legends, and malevolent mythologies.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
